marklogic.body:
clocker200: I'm not saying that the fight didn't happen, or that Martin didn't get an underhand at some point (he might). I'm just saying that it seemed more and more unlikely to happened like Zimmerman claimed: fighting for his dear life, having to Act quickly before being pummeled to death...etc..
Morethan1: Yeah, the paramedics would treat his wounds, but.... would they also gave him a change of clothes? The broken nose would Bleed like h*ll, wouldn't it? Was it even possible that none of it stuck?
